enchantment.ma-enchants.curse_butterfing: Chance to drop your item when mining or attacking a mob.
enchantment.ma-enchants.stone_mending.de: Chance to restore durability when mining stone.
enchantment.ma-enchants.momentum.desc: Mining speed increases for each consecutive block of the same one.
enchantment.ma-enchants.true_shot.desc: Arrows fired by this bow will not be affected by gravity.
enchantment.ma-enchants.floating.desc: Any mob struck with this enchant will be affected by the floating effect.
enchantment.ma-enchants.paralysis.desc: Any mob struck with this will find themselves unable to move, jump, or attack.
enchantment.ma-enchants.combo.desc: Increased damage with each successful strike, resets if it hits air or blocks.
enchantment.ma-enchants.lifesteal.desc: Part of dealt damage restore your health.
enchantment.ma-enchants.wisdom.desc: Gives you more XP when killing mobs
enchantment.ma-enchants.blazing_walker.d: Temporary turns lava into a melted cobblestone.
enchantment.ma-enchants.step_assist.desc: Allows you to walk onto 1 height block without jumping.
enchantment.ma-enchants.night_vision.des: Gives you night vision potion effect when you wear it.
enchantment.ma-enchants.multi_jump.desc: Allows you to make more jump in air.
